content.text:
Show the git status and recent commits for Claude chat history in this project.

```bash
PROJECT_DIR=$(pwd)
CLAUDE_PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$PROJECT_DIR" | sed 's/\//-/g')
CLAUDE_DIR="$HOME/.claude/projects/$CLAUDE_PROJECT_NAME"

if [ ! -e "$CLAUDE_DIR/.git" ]; then
    echo "Claude history not set up for this project."
    echo "Run /history-setup to set it up."
    exit 1
fi

cd "$CLAUDE_DIR"
echo "=== Claude History Status ==="
git status --short
echo ""
echo "=== Recent Commits ==="
git log --oneline -5
```

!bash -c 'PROJECT_DIR=$(pwd); CLAUDE_PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$PROJECT_DIR" | sed "s/\//-/g"); CLAUDE_DIR="$HOME/.claude/projects/$CLAUDE_PROJECT_NAME"; if [ ! -e "$CLAUDE_DIR/.git" ]; then echo "Claude history not set up. Run /history-setup first."; exit 1; fi; cd "$CLAUDE_DIR"; echo "=== Claude History Status ==="; git status --short; echo ""; echo "=== Recent Commits ==="; git log --oneline -5'

Run /history-setup first."; exit 1; fi; cd "$CLAUDE_DIR"; echo "=== Claude History Status ==="; git status --short; echo ""; echo "=== Recent Commits ==="; git log --oneline -5

content.text:
Your Claude chat history shows:
- 2 modified conversations
- 5 new untracked conversations 
- Last commit: `81b3191 Update Claude chat history 2025-08-08 17:46`

Use `/history-save` to commit these changes.

Commit the current Claude chat history for this project to git.

If no message is provided, uses a default timestamp-based message.

!~/.claude/scripts/checkin-claude-history.sh "$ARGUMENTS"
